channel.title: Project pluto requesting development team
channel.description:
[center][b]Project Pluto[/b][/center] What is project pluto? A soon to be server strictly based on having a good economy and community with active pking. Just an all out fun to play server made for everyone. This server will NOT have customs such as retarded shit like dildos. It will have a dedicated founder, I plan to stick to this project and complete it. This server will get hosted, I will pay fees for VPS/Advertisement etc. The development team will receive a percentage of the donations, by development team I mean people who were in from the start. Not admin/moderators.
Base: PI ofc.
What's needed: 2 server-based developers. 2 client-based developers. 1 web master (control over forums/etc) 1 GFX artist.
Requirements: Must have SOME knowledge of coding RSPS. Maturity level above 1. Experience using dropbox.
There is no application, just add me on msn or pm me and we'll go from there, in my opinion applications doesn't show the experience a person has. Most people will get a chance, if you succeed welcome to the team if not, atleast you got a chance.
My msn: teh_service@live.com
[center][b]Media[/b][/center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TP6Kl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SciUl.png[/img]

yeah ill help ! , i know the basics of coding but ask me to do somthing i will find out how to do it and wont give up till its done ! , and i have used dropbox many of times !

item.title: Project pluto requesting development team
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:1, topic:442288”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=544879.msg3994443#msg3994443 date=1337075169]
I’ll be your webmaster if you want.
Only thing is, I don’t work with free hosting packages, I only work with paid.

Proof of my work;
http://prothieum.org
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,544922.msg3994440.html
[/quote]Man, you should really crop them pictures. They are hurting my eyes.[/quote]
Why should I crop them? They’re to show you a full webpage, the whole point of them is not to be cropped.

Read full topic
